typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		cur_description as string,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2),
		last_updated_by as string,
		HashedValues as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_currency.parquet']) ~> preDimCurrency
source(output(
		dim_key as long,
		top_code as string,
		top_description as string,
		cur_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dim/dim_currency.parquet']) ~> dimCurrencyInput
preDimCurrency derive(top_code = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Currencies') ~> DeriveTopLevel
dimCurrencyInput aggregate(maxKey = max(Dim_key)) ~> MaxExistingDimKey
dimCurrencyInput derive(existingHash = sha1(cur_code,cur_description,curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd)) ~> ExistingHashed
DeriveTopLevel derive(hashedValues = sha1(pk_key,cur_description,curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd)) ~> DeriveHashed
ExistingHashed select(mapColumn(
		existingHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExisintgHash
DeriveHashed, SelectExisintgHash exists(DeriveHashed@hashedValues == existingHash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists
Exists alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(top_code))) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_currency.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCurrencyInsert
